page.title: 19RONALD BAKER_councillor
page.content:
Mr Baker was chosen as a typical miner who became involved in the local community.
He entered the world of local politics through his Trade Union work.His first position was as a member of the Aberbeeg Hospital Board. Mr Baker became leader of the old Abertillery Town Council and served as Mayor twice. He has served on the council since 1949 and been a member of Abertillery School Governors' since that time. Mr Baker represents the Cwmtillery Ward of Abertillery and at present serves on eight of the ten borough committees.
Mr Baker is serving his last appointment as he will not be standing for re-election.
